name: Cemetery walk (tqkrisper)
description:
Zach is a family man whose whole life is to protect and take care of his wife and two little girls. When hard times hit his family financially Zack became frantic to seek more financial help. When two unknown men give Zack an opportunity to help, he is caught between a huge commitment. The goal is to dig up bones and sell them back to the 2 unknown men. Can Zack make it through the night without getting caught? Or will become prey to the creatures that lie within the forest cemetery.  

How To Play: 

Move with Arrows or WASD. 

The flashlight is F Key. 

Jumping is Space Key.
